original_text: The days of my life are passing very quickly, like a fast runner. None of my days makes me happy. The days of my life are passing very quickly, like a fast runner. None of my days makes me happy. The days of my life are passing very quickly,
korean_text: 나의 날이 경주자보다 빨리 사라져 버리니 복을 볼 수 없구나

sentences.original_text: The days of my life are passing very quickly
sentences.korean_translation: 내 인생의 날들이 아주 빠르게 지나가고 있네

sentences.original_text: None of my days makes me happy
sentences.korean_translation: 내 날들 중 하나도 나를 행복하게 하지 못해
